biocontainers.name: midas
biocontainers.summary: An integrated pipeline for estimating strain-level genomic variation from metagenomic data

biotools.summary: Software designed to compute the theoretical isotopic distribution for molecules of known elemental composition. It computes for a molecule simultaneously two isotopic distributions: the coarse-grained isotopic distribution and the fine-grained isotopic distribution.

bioschemas.name: MIDAs
bioschemas.summary: Software designed to compute the theoretical isotopic distribution for molecules of known elemental composition. It computes for a molecule simultaneously two isotopic distributions: the coarse-grained isotopic distribution and the fine-grained isotopic distribution.
